description.name: Segmented Turbo Rim Diamond Blade 230x22,2mm Rim 10mm GEKO Premium by laser
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Ideal for use on brick, block, concrete, aggregated concrete, masonry, stone and tile

  • Hardened steel body

  • Turbo diamond segments can withstand higher temperatures during cutting

  • Laser welded segments

  • Optimized hole pattern for fast dust removal and cooling


Technical Data



  • Disc Diameter: 230 mm

  • Hole Size: 22,23 mm

  • Height of Segments: 10 mm

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 12200
description.short_desc:
Product Features

  • Optimized hole pattern for fast dust removal and cooling

description.name: Silicon Carbide Flap Disc 125mm Grit 40 GEKO Premium
description.long_desc:
Heavy duty Silicon Carbide cloth bonded to fibreglass backing disc. Abrasive segments glued to fibreglass disc with steel reinforcing ring.


Product Features



  • Ideal for grinding, finishing, stock removal and weld dressing

  • Fibreglass carrier plate

  • For use with hand-held angle grinders

  • Suitable for use on marble, stone, glass, and non ferrous metals


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Silicon Carbide

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Hole: 22,2 mm

  • Grit: 40

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 12200
description.short_desc:
Heavy duty Silicon Carbide cloth bonded to fibreglass backing disc. Abrasive segments glued to fibreglass disc with steel reinforcing ring.


Product Features



  • Ideal for grinding, finishing, stock removal and weld dressing

  • Fibreglass carrier plate

  • For use with hand-held angle grinders

  • Suitable for use on marble, stone, glass, and non ferrous metals


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Silicon Carbide

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Hole: 22,2 mm

  • Grit: 40

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 12200

description.name: Silicon Carbide Abrasive Disc with Velcro 125mm Grit 220
description.long_desc:
Silicon Carbide abrasive discs. Abrasive material is very hard, harder than aluminum oxide. Ideal for sanding hard materials like metal, for paint removal, and for use on plastic and fibreglass.


Product Features



  • Silicon Carbide grain

  • Resin connection

  • Velcro backing


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Silicon Carbide

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Grit: 220
description.short_desc:
Silicon Carbide abrasive discs. Abrasive material is very hard, harder than aluminum oxide. Ideal for sanding hard materials like metal, for paint removal, and for use on plastic and fibreglass.


Product Features



  • Silicon Carbide grain

  • Resin connection

  • Velcro backing


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Silicon Carbide

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Grit: 220

description.name: Zirconia Alumina Flap Disc 125mm Grit 40 GEKO Premium
description.long_desc:
Zirconia Alumina abrasive discs. Zirconia alumina is a self-sharpening abrasive that allows for a faster cut rate and longer life than aluminum oxide.


Product Features



  • Zirconia Alumina grain coating

  • Ideal for carbon/mild steel applications

  • Good heat resistance

  • Resin connection

  • Velcro backing


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Zirconia Alumina

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Grit: 40

description.name: Zinc Stearate Abrasive Disc with Velcro 125mm Grit 100
description.long_desc:
Zinc Stearate abrasive discs. Sandpaper with this coating will require less maintenance - clogging prevention. Ideal for dry sanding and finishing wood, metal, plastic or other soft materials.


Product Features



  • Zinc Stearate grain coating

  • Resin connection

  • Velcro backing


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Zinc Stearate

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Grit: 100

description.name: Sanding Mesh 105x280mm P40
description.long_desc:
Sanding mesh is ideal for plaster, plasterboard and drywall finishing. Can be used both sides.


Product Features



  • Silicon Carbide - coated mesh

  • Waterproof open construction

  • Size 105 x 280 mm


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Silicon Carbide

  • Sanding Area: 105 x 280 mm

  • Grit: 40

description.name: 150mm self-adhesive paper with holes P40
description.long_desc:
Aluminium Oxide abrasive discs dust-free with 8 holes. Ideal for sanding metal, non-metallic materials, wood, rubber, leather, plastic, stone and glass.


Product Features



  • Aluminium Oxide grain

  • 8 small holes for dust collection

  • Resin connection

  • Velcro backing


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Aluminium Oxide

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Disc Diameter: 150 mm

  • Grit: 40

description.name: Aluminium Oxide Fibre Disc with Cross Cuts 125mm Grit 40
description.long_desc:
Aluminium Oxide resin-backed fibre discs. Use for grinding, finishing, stock removal and weld dressing. Ideal for use on steel, cast iron, alloys and wood. Designed for use with rubber backing discs.


Product Features



  • Aluminium Oxide grain

  • Resin connection

  • Cross slot fitting

  • Use with hand-held angle grinders


Technical Data



  • Abrasive Material: Aluminium Oxide

  • Abrasive Connection: Resin

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Grit: 40

  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm
